name: Lydia Yang
content: Pretty sweet tool that makes it so much easier to visualize and plan a road trip to my favourite rock climbing destinations and explore the area around.

name: Abigail King
content: I’ve been dreaming of a tool like this for years and finally it’s here! So many travel planning apps promise to make life easier but end up being fiddly, glitchy and time consuming. NomadTravels is my new go-to tool after decades of professional travel.
